TopicTitle: what age is the average ksp player?

Articles.Content:
its a poll by the way.

i made this poll to figure out how old the average ksp player is.
Your poll options need work. Should a 20 year old pick 10-20 or 20-30? And there is no option for people 41-49 or 61-69.

^ Agreed. Dating myself, but there are no options here that I can click.

Best,

-Slashy

Well, I would recommend a different option list based on the expected curve, such as:

Up to 8

9-12

13-17

18-25

26-35

36-45

46-50

51-60

61-70

80+

Your poll options need work. Should a 20 year old pick 10-20 or 20-30? And there is no option for people 41-49 or 61-69.

ty. reset poll and try again.

Your poll options need work. Should a 20 year old pick 10-20 or 20-30? And there is no option for people 41-49 or 61-69.

you just estimate but your right i should make it so you can chose multiples.

but for example if i was say 24 i would chose op 2 beacuse im closer to 20 then i am to 30 if i was 25 i would chose op 3 cause im closer to 30 then i am to 20...or something.

but your right it needs some work.

Edited September 7, 2015 by carneyvich

WRONG. Do it again!

Every time I make a mistake I hear that in my head.

(How can you have any pudding if you don't eat your meat?!)

But I would like to see the results of this poll.

I think everyone I talk to around here is about 45.

Edited September 7, 2015 by Brainlord Mesomorph

^ Agreed. Dating myself, but there are no options here that I can click.

Best,

-Slashy

The nick that has sliderule doesn't age you at all, lol, only because most of the posters here have never heard of a sliderule. On the bright side we prolly don't have any abacus jockey's here.

I think it might be best to close this one and have the OP make a new one. In the Space Lounge preferably, where age threads have gone in the past.

Locked.
